p: In 2014, the Eswatini Ministry of Health launched the MaxART stepped‐wedge randomized controlled trial to implement EAAA through the government‐managed health system. Eswatini has one of the highest HIV prevalence rates in the world, 27%, and an estimated annual incidence of 1.36% in adults [ 9]. While the Eswatini Ministry of Health had made substantial progress in addressing their HIV epidemic, there was interest in identifying an effective, sustainable approach to reduce the infection rate. Without this reduction, the number of people needing HIV treatment in Eswatini will likely expand along with the treatment costs.
